ygData.subject: Re: (unknown)
ygData.msgSnippet: I have been working on this quest too. The ghouls were easy compared to the DE, can t find him anywhere. I am on the Torv server and I only found 3 ghouls up
ygData.messageBody:
I have been working on this quest too. The ghouls were easy compared
to the DE, can't find him anywhere. I am on the Torv server and I
only found 3 ghouls up at a time. Got tired of the respawn time, so
went back the next day and they were on track. Might just have been
someone killing them the day you were hunting them.


--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, Rob LeBeau <rlebeau65@y...> wrote:
> Not that I know of,
> Those ghouls do spawn, they were not part of the
> event.
> They are not a common POP though.
>
> Try again, let us know how you make out.
>
> Rob
> --- Matthew Bond <mattgbond@n...> wrote:
> >
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: "Nick Thompson" <poolsharkbc@y...>
> > To: <everquest@yahoogroups.com>
> > Sent: Sunday, April 18, 2004 2:18 PM
> > Subject: [EverQuest] (unknown)
> >
> >
> > > Hey,
> > >
> > > I am having a lot of trouble completing a
> > > druid/cleric quest that starts in Felwithe. It is
> > for
> > > the Initiate of Tunare neckpiece, that will
> > eventually
> > > lead me to getting a neck piece that has a mana
> > free
> > > root effect. I am having problems getting the
> > > Rancerous Ghouls to spawn in Lesser Faydark. I
> > have
> > > done all day (real time) camps running around
> > killing
> > > undead, and tracking, but can't seem to get them
> > to
> > > spawn. Any ideas?
> > >
> > > Iaeerwen Feywarder
> > > Druid of the 20th Season.
> >
> > I'm not sure that they spawn anymore... I think they
> > were only there
> > fore a couple of weeks for a special 'event' a
> > couple of years ago, and
> > the quest involving them dates to that event too.
> >
> > I may be wrong, but I don't think that quest works
> > anymore.
> >
> > Honig Wayfarer
> > 65 Ranger
> > Cazic Thule
